abstract: Lumber Liquidators shares sink more than 19 percent after Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says cancer risk caused by exposure to some of company’s laminate flooring is actually higher than was initially reported.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Lumber Liquidators plunged more than 19 percent on news of an increased risk of cancer linked to the company’s laminate flooring.

headline.main: Lumber Liquidators Takes Hit After C.D.C. Elevates Warning
headline.print_headline: Lumber Liquidators Takes Hit After C.D.C. Elevates Warning

snippet: Shares of Lumber Liquidators plunged more than 19 percent on news of an increased risk of cancer linked to the company’s laminate flooring.
